name: From Light, To Light.
description:
From Light, To Light. is  a platformer game.

The goal is to complete the levels the fastest possible way. It's pretty bare bones but I might add a survival aspect to the game in the near future.

I hope you like it.

Controls :

WASD - Move around

Space  bar - Jump and double jump

Left  Shift / Left Control   - Crouch or Slide

To wall run - Use either W or S and strafe in the direction of the wall you want to run on
